entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
